content:
As Kadence grapples with the decision to accept the call and pursue his dreams, there are a few events that could serve as a climax to the "Refusal of the Call" section:

1. A turning point in Kadence's day job: Perhaps he experiences a particularly challenging day at work, or has a realization that his job is holding him back from his true passion. This could be a catalyst for him to finally make the decision to pursue his dreams.
2. A musical performance: Kadence could perform at an open mic night or other musical event, where he pours his heart and soul into his music and feels a deep connection with his audience. This could be a turning point for him, as he realizes the power of his music and the impact it can have on others.
3. A conversation with a mentor or trusted friend: Kadence could have a conversation with someone who he trusts and respects, who encourages him to follow his dreams and reminds him of his talent and potential. This could be the push that Kadence needs to finally make the decision to pursue his music full-time.

By incorporating these events into the documentary series, you can create a compelling and emotional climax to the "Refusal of the Call" section, and set the stage for Kadence's journey as he moves forward and accepts the call to adventure.
